title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 465.22 - Construction of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 465.22 - Construction of rules

State Regulations

This Part shall be liberally construed to accomplish the
purposes of the New York State Human Rights Law and the policies of the
division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
465.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
